definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大氣壓力低，沸點就低。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 當水汽凝成雨水，會造成局域性的大氣壓力下降。

sentences.english: Atmospheric pressure acting on the downstream side of the diaphragm forces the diaphragm and seat up.
sentences.chinese: 作用於隔膜下側的大氣壓力使隔膜和閥座上升開啓。

sentences.english: No difference recognized between the engine MAP reading and the barometric (atmospheric) pressure reading at start-up.
sentences.chinese: 啓動時發動機MAP讀數與大氣壓讀數無差異。

sentences.english: The gas to be studied is admitted to the tube at a known temperature and at atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 被研究的氣體在已知溫度和大氣壓力下充入管中。

sentences.english: PRESSURE】The air pressure at sea level is nearly 15 pounds for each square inch.
sentences.chinese: 海平面上的大氣壓力每一平方英寸約有十五磅。

sentences.english: The deviation of sound above and below the atmospheric pressure levels is called Sound Pressure.
sentences.chinese: 上述偏差的聲音和大氣壓力下被稱爲聲壓水平。

sentences.english: And I put a cylinder with one bar pressure on top.
sentences.chinese: 在水面上用圓柱活塞加一個大氣壓的氣壓。

sentences.english: In other words, about a quarter of an atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 話句話說，等於大氣壓的四分之一。

sentences.english: Certainly, typically, it would just be atmosphere pressure.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說這裏必然會有大氣壓存在。

sentences.english: A high vacuum in the fuel tank can cause atmospheric pressure to collapse the tank.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱內的高真空，會引起大氣壓力壓塌油箱。

sentences.english: If we did not have atmospheric pressure, we could not have automobile tires.
sentences.chinese: 假如我們沒有大氣壓，我們就不能有汽車輪胎了。

sentences.english: When a pressure is less than atmospheric pressure it is called a vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 某種壓力低於大氣壓力的狀況被稱作真空。

sentences.english: Where am I going wrong here?
So you start with the bicycle pump at one bar, let's say, right?
A rise or drop in barometric pressure is a possible cause of vacuum or overpressure in a tank.
sentences.chinese: 大氣壓升高或降低可能導致罐內產生真空或超壓。
